General.Name: Sigachi Industries Limited
General.Description: Sigachi Industries Limited manufactures and sells microcrystalline cellulose and cellulose powder in India and internationally. It serves pharmaceutical and nutraceutical, food and nutrition, cosmetic, and chemical industries. The company was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
General.Address: Kalyan?s Tulsi Ram Chambers, Hyderabad, India, 500049
